ISSUE.TITLE: Low stock quantity
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Add low stock quantity field in model, which now will allow users to configure when client will see 'low stock' availability status. Previous 'in stock' and 'out of stock' nop statuses are nice, but most store engines provides also 'low stock' state to inform clients they should consider buying product now (because product may disappear in near future from store).

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #5089 Added product information about low stock
